name: Fort Lytton Farm
description:
You are an adventurer who is travelling to Brookfall Keep. On the long journey, you accept a quest from a farmer at Fort Lytton Farm to earn some more gold pieces.

In this VR Experience you awake at your camp outside of Fort Lytton farm, you will find a parchment with the instructions of the quest located on a bench nearby. Complete your quest and earn your gold so you can continue your journey to Brookfall Keep!
